name: PalmSpaceJS
description: Prototype for conducting user studies for hand interactions via browser and webcam.

scripts.start: node-sass public/styles.scss public/styles.css && tsc --noImplicitThis --watch & sleep 3 && firefox localhost:3000 &>/dev/null & sleep 1 && nodemon --trace-warnings dist/app.js
scripts.kill: DEBUG=app:startup,app:db,app:* && sudo kill $(ps -s $$ -o pid=); sudo kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:3000)
scripts.prod: DEBUG=app:startup,app:db && node-sass public/styles.scss public/styles.css && tsc && node dist/app.js
